sp_widget.name: IT Health SysTrack - Device X-Ray
sp_widget.template:
${DEVICE X-RAY}

{{c.data.user.mem}} ({{c.data.user.chassis}})
${Stability Index}
${Operation System} {{c.data.user.os}} ${CPU} {{c.data.user.cpu}}
${Last Boot} ${Business Location}
${Manufacturer} {{c.data.user.mfgr || '-'}} ${Model} {{c.data.user.model || '-'}}
${IP Address} {{c.data.user.ip || '-'}} ${Subnet Mask}
${DNS Servers} ${MAC Address}
${Connected User} {{c.data.user.username || '-'}} ${FQDN} {{c.data.user.fqdn || '-'}}

${Top Processes}

${Recorded At}: {{c.blackbox && c.blackbox.recordtime.time | date: 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm a' || '-'}}
${Application} ${Process} ${Value}
{{data.packagename || data.app}} {{data.app}} {{data.processdata[selectedTypeProcess]}} {{getTypeProcessValue()}}
X

${Disconnected}

${Unable to connect to the D3 Lakeside system.}
${The system may be off or there may be network issues.}
X

${User not found}

${Please make sure the user has a registered account in Lakeside Systrack.}
